Package de.hardcode.jxinput

JXInput by HARDCODE Dev., Dipl.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Axis The Axis interface describes the most common feature of a joystick or other input devices.
Button  
Directional  
Feature An input device offers a set of features (otherwise it would be pretty useless).
JXInputDevice The JXInputDevise is the main entrypoint to the jxinput package.
 

Class Summary
JXInputManager Manages the available instances of JXInputDevice.
 

Package de.hardcode.jxinput Description

JXInput by HARDCODE Dev., Dipl. Phys. Joerg Plewe.

JXInput connects gaming input devices like joysticks or gamepads to the Java environment.

Comments send to jxinput@hardcode.de.
